org.liris.smartgov.lez.input.establishment

Class SimturbLambert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.geo.utils.lambert.Lambert
      • org.liris.smartgov.lez.input.establishment.SimturbLambert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.geo.utils.Projection

    public class SimturbLambert
extends org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.geo.utils.lambert.Lambert
    For unknown reasons, the "official" Lambert II projection brought bad results : all latitudes are computed with a translation. This might come from the origin latitude considered (lambda0), but because no other suitable know origin meridian has been found, we just add an offset computed from the bad latitude and the correct latitude (from OSM) of a known establishment.
